import Card, { PinkCard, TopBar, BottomBar, InfoPack } from "./Components.js"; import "./App.css"; import React from "react"; function AccountProtectionScreen() { return ( <>

Account Protection

Your social media and email accounts hold details about your digital identity
and your personal information. If someone gets access to these accounts, they
can obtain this information or even post and content on your behalf.

Use a strong and unique password} description={<>Use a strong password on all your accounts (social media, email, instant messaging, etc.) and do not
use the same password for multiple accounts.} /> Keep your password a secret} description={<>Do not share your password with others and do not enter your password in front of others. If you think
your account has been infiltrated, change your password immediately.} /> Protect your account case} description={<>Log out of your account after using it on a device that is not yours.} /> Take advantage of security settings} description={<>Set up security & privacy settings in your account, such as limiting those who can see your posts to
"friends only", using two-factor authentication, and setting up spam protection} />
); } export default AccountProtectionScreen;
